publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3814 Mrs Margaret Ewing: Scottish Environment Week 2006—That the Parliament welcomes the forthcoming Scottish Environment Week which will take place from 6 to 12 February 2006; notes that the event will highlight the importance of our environment and its value to Scotland’s society and economy; further notes that as a nation Scotland has awoken to the importance of protecting our rich and diverse environment, and recognises the dedication of individual people, workplaces and communities in striving to safeguard our environment so that future generations can benefit from and enjoy it.

S2M-3814 Scottish Environment Week 2006 (lodged on 13 January 2006) Stewart Stevenson*, Fiona Hyslop*, Dr Jean Turner*, Mr David Davidson*, Christine Grahame*, Rob Gibson*, Jim Mather*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Mr Jim Wallace*, Brian Adam*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*

S2M-3814 Scottish Environment Week 2006 (lodged on 13 January 2006) Mr Frank McAveety*, Bruce Crawford*, Alex Neil*, Mike Pringle*, Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*, Eleanor Scott*, Mr John Swinney*, Alex Johnstone*, Mary Scanlon*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Richard Lochhead*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-3814 Scottish Environment Week 2006 (lodged on 13 January 2006) Mr Andrew Welsh*, Chris Ballance*, Karen Gillon*
S2M-3814 Scottish Environment Week 2006 (lodged on 13 January 2006) John Swinburne*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-3814 Scottish Environment Week 2006 (lodged on 13 January 2006) Susan Deacon*, Shiona Baird*
S2M-3814 Scottish Environment Week 2006 (lodged on 13 January 2006) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
